meanings.definition: To leap or jump over or beyond something.
meanings.sent1: The cat was outleaping the fence to catch the butterfly.
meanings.sent2: The athlete was outleaping all his competitors in the high jump.
meanings.sent3: The kangaroo was outleaping the other animals at the zoo.
meanings.sent4: Her joy was outleaping her fear as she jumped into the pool.
meanings.sent5: The deer was outleaping gracefully through the forest.

meanings.definition: To surpass in leaping or jumping.
meanings.sent1: The frog was outleaping its previous record with each jump.
meanings.sent2: The rabbit was outleaping all the other animals in the field.
meanings.sent3: The grasshopper was outleaping its own expectations.
meanings.sent4: His excitement was outleaping his physical abilities.
meanings.sent5: The dancer was outleaping her own limits on stage.
